name: Xingqiu
description: The second son of the Feiyun Commerce Guild, Xingqiu has had a reputation for being studious and polite ever since he was a young child. But there is another side to the mild-mannered Xingqiu everyone knows. A daring, adventurous and much more mischievous side...

skills.name: Guhua Style
skills.description:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen
skills.description:
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.

The Rain Swords have the following properties:

  • When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
  • Increase the character's resistance to interruption.
  • 20% of Xingqiu's Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords. The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
  • The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
  • Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character.

skills.name: Guhua Sword: Raincutter
skills.description:
Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords.

Rainbow Bladework:

  • Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG.
  • Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.
  • These effects carry over to other characters.

passives.name: Hydropathic
passives.description: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

passives.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
passives.description: Xingqiu gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.

passives.name: Flash of Genius
passives.description: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: The Scent Remained
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1. (Making the total amount of Rain Swords 4)

constellations.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.description: Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s. Decreases the Hydro RES of opponents hit by sword rain by 15% for 4s.

constellations.name: Weaver of Verses
constellations.description: Increases the level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evilsoother
constellations.description: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Embrace of Rain
constellations.description: Increases the level of Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.description: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit opponents. [The energy is given only for every third activated attack, as is better explained in the Chinese description.[5][6]]
